datasets.name: aa8790f8
queryLines:
SELECT 
DIM_DP.COD_DIRECTOR_PELICULA,
DIM_DP.DES_DIRECTOR_PELICULA,
DIM_GP.COD_GENERO_PELICULA,
DIM_GP.DES_GENERO_PELICULA,
DIM_IP.COD_IDIOMA_PELICULA,
DIM_IP.DES_IDIOMA_PELICULA,
DIM_P.COD_PELICULA,
DIM_P.DES_PELICULA,
DIM_P.DES_DURACION_PELICULA,
DIM_P.DES_TOP_ACTORES,
DIM_P.DES_RUTA_POSTER_FRONTAL,
DIM_P.DES_RUTA_POSTER_TRASERA,
DIM_P.FEC_LANZAMIENTO,
FCT.VAL_PUNTUACION_USUARIO,
FCT.VAL_DURACION_PELICULA_HORA,
FCT.VAL_DURACION_PELICULA_MINUTOS,
FCT.VAL_NUMERO_VOTOS,
FCT.VAL_PRESUPUESTO_USD,
FCT.VAL_GANANCIAS_USD
FROM catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_fct_pelicula FCT
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_director_pelicula_t2 DIM_DP
ON FCT.SK_DIM_DIRECTOR = DIM_DP.SK_DIM_DIRECTOR
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_genero_pelicula_t0 DIM_GP
ON FCT.SK_DIM_GENERO = DIM_GP.SK_DIM_GENERO
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_idioma_pelicula_t0 DIM_IP
ON FCT.SK_DIM_IDIOMA = DIM_IP.SK_DIM_IDIOMA
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_pelicula_t1 DIM_P
ON FCT.SK_DIM_PELICULA = DIM_P.SK_DIM_PELICULA

datasets.name: 9e249556
queryLines:
--Counter widgets
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT COD_PELICULA) as total_peliculas,
  ROUND(AVG(VAL_PUNTUACION_USUARIO), 2) as puntuacion_promedio,
  ROUND(SUM(VAL_PRESUPUESTO_USD)/1000000, 2) as presupuesto_total_millones,
  ROUND(SUM(VAL_GANANCIAS_USD)/1000000, 2) as ganancias_totales_millones,
  COUNT(DISTINCT DES_DIRECTOR_PELICULA) as total_directores
FROM catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_fct_pelicula FCT
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_director_pelicula_t2 DIM_DP
ON FCT.SK_DIM_DIRECTOR = DIM_DP.SK_DIM_DIRECTOR
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_pelicula_t1 DIM_P
ON FCT.SK_DIM_PELICULA = DIM_P.SK_DIM_PELICULA

datasets.name: d37398a5
datasets.displayName: Top Movie Genres by Count Rating and Revenue Summary
queryLines:
--Bar chart
SELECT 
  DES_GENERO_PELICULA as genero,
  COUNT(DISTINCT COD_PELICULA) as cantidad_peliculas,
  ROUND(AVG(VAL_PUNTUACION_USUARIO), 2) as puntuacion_promedio,
  ROUND(SUM(VAL_GANANCIAS_USD)/1000000, 2) as ganancias_millones
FROM catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_fct_pelicula FCT
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_genero_pelicula_t0 DIM_GP
ON FCT.SK_DIM_GENERO = DIM_GP.SK_DIM_GENERO
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_pelicula_t1 DIM_P
ON FCT.SK_DIM_PELICULA = DIM_P.SK_DIM_PELICULA
WHERE DES_GENERO_PELICULA IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY DES_GENERO_PELICULA
ORDER BY cantidad_peliculas DESC
LIMIT 15

datasets.name: aa040f4a
datasets.displayName: Top Movie Directors Ranked by Ratings and Earnings
queryLines:
--Table or Bar chart
SELECT 
  DES_DIRECTOR_PELICULA as director,
  COUNT(DISTINCT COD_PELICULA) as num_peliculas,
  ROUND(AVG(VAL_PUNTUACION_USUARIO), 2) as puntuacion_promedio,
  ROUND(AVG(VAL_GANANCIAS_USD)/1000000, 2) as ganancia_promedio_millones
FROM catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_fct_pelicula FCT
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_director_pelicula_t2 DIM_DP
ON FCT.SK_DIM_DIRECTOR = DIM_DP.SK_DIM_DIRECTOR
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_pelicula_t1 DIM_P
ON FCT.SK_DIM_PELICULA = DIM_P.SK_DIM_PELICULA
WHERE DES_DIRECTOR_PELICULA IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY DES_DIRECTOR_PELICULA
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT COD_PELICULA) >= 2
ORDER BY puntuacion_promedio DESC
LIMIT 10

datasets.name: 5cbdfd70
datasets.displayName: Top fifty movies ranked by return on investment percentage
queryLines:
--Scatter plot
SELECT 
  DES_PELICULA as pelicula,
  VAL_PRESUPUESTO_USD/1000000 as presupuesto_millones,
  VAL_GANANCIAS_USD/1000000 as ganancias_millones,
  ROUND(((VAL_GANANCIAS_USD - VAL_PRESUPUESTO_USD) / NULLIF(VAL_PRESUPUESTO_USD, 0)) * 100, 2) as roi_porcentaje,
  VAL_PUNTUACION_USUARIO as puntuacion
FROM catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_fct_pelicula FCT
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_pelicula_t1 DIM_P
ON FCT.SK_DIM_PELICULA = DIM_P.SK_DIM_PELICULA
WHERE VAL_PRESUPUESTO_USD > 0 AND VAL_GANANCIAS_USD > 0
ORDER BY roi_porcentaje DESC
LIMIT 50

datasets.name: 0fc16abb
datasets.displayName: Yearly Movie Counts Ratings and Revenue Summary
queryLines:
--Line chart
SELECT 
  DATE_FORMAT(FEC_LANZAMIENTO,'y') as anio,
  COUNT(DISTINCT COD_PELICULA) as cantidad_peliculas,
  ROUND(AVG(VAL_PUNTUACION_USUARIO), 2) as puntuacion_promedio,
  ROUND(AVG(VAL_PRESUPUESTO_USD)/1000000, 2) as presupuesto_promedio_millones,
  ROUND(AVG(VAL_GANANCIAS_USD)/1000000, 2) as ganancia_promedio_millones
FROM catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_fct_pelicula FCT
LEFT JOIN catalog_jptq.golden_jptq.tbl_dim_pelicula_t1 DIM_P
ON FCT.SK_DIM_PELICULA = DIM_P.SK_DIM_PELICULA
WHERE FEC_LANZAMIENTO IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(FEC_LANZAMIENTO,'y')
ORDER BY 1

datasets.name: 726cbbac
queryLines:
SELECT
  p.`DES_PELICULA`,
  d.`DES_DIRECTOR_PELICULA`,
  g.`DES_GENERO_PELICULA`,
  i.`DES_IDIOMA_PELICULA`,
  AVG(f.`VAL_PUNTUACION_USUARIO`) AS avg_puntuacion_usuario,
  SUM(f.`VAL_NUMERO_VOTOS`) AS total_votos,
  SUM(f.`VAL_PRESUPUESTO_USD`) AS total_presupuesto_usd,
  SUM(f.`VAL_GANANCIAS_USD`) AS total_ganancias_usd
FROM
  `catalog_jptq`.`golden_jptq`.`tbl_fct_pelicula` f
    JOIN `catalog_jptq`.`golden_jptq`.`tbl_dim_pelicula_t1` p
      ON f.`SK_DIM_PELICULA` = p.`SK_DIM_PELICULA`
    JOIN `catalog_jptq`.`golden_jptq`.`tbl_dim_director_pelicula_t2` d
      ON f.`SK_DIM_DIRECTOR` = d.`SK_DIM_DIRECTOR`
    JOIN `catalog_jptq`.`golden_jptq`.`tbl_dim_genero_pelicula_t0` g
      ON f.`SK_DIM_GENERO` = g.`SK_DIM_GENERO`
    JOIN `catalog_jptq`.`golden_jptq`.`tbl_dim_idioma_pelicula_t0` i
      ON f.`SK_DIM_IDIOMA` = i.`SK_DIM_IDIOMA`
WHERE
  p.`DES_PELICULA` IS NOT NULL
  AND d.`DES_DIRECTOR_PELICULA` IS NOT NULL
  AND g.`DES_GENERO_PELICULA` IS NOT NULL
  AND i.`DES_IDIOMA_PELICULA` IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  p.`DES_PELICULA`,
  d.`DES_DIRECTOR_PELICULA`,
  g.`DES_GENERO_PELICULA`,
  i.`DES_IDIOMA_PELICULA`
ORDER BY
  avg_puntuacion_usuario DESC,
  total_votos DESC
LIMIT 50;
